title: Financial Review Young Rich 2017
text:
Atlassian co-founders Mike Cannon-Brookes and Scott Farquhar top the list with a record $6.08 billion wealth, almost 10 times more than the next names on the Young Rich.

The list charts the money-making trends of the country's most talented entrepreneurs including the emerging "business of beauty" industry led by the likes of newcomer and fitness and health market leader Emily Skye.

It features 27 debutants in all, ranging from former accountant and now fashion retailer Jane Lu, ex-AFL footballer turned technology disrupter Joel Macdonald, trampoline franchise magnate Brent Grundy and HiSmile co-founders Nik Mirkovic and Alex Tomic.

Showpo founder and former accountant Jane Lu is one of the 27 debutants on this year's Young Rich List.

The list also includes successful and perennial Young List members such as mining investment entrepreneur Tolga Kumova.

Rich List editor John Stensholt
description: Explore the 2017 edition of the Financial Review Young Rich, featuring the wealthiest young Australians and how they earned their fortune.
